PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-03821998-03-180HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MERLA BECKERMAN, of West Vancouver, British Columbia, as Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Ruth Freiman, whose term has expired.
Attachments
